We are very excited to introduce the Man Overboard kit: essentials for life on the go. Our goal was to create a beautiful set of leather goods that will be functional
identifier: simple and last a lifetime. We are making the whole kit available at a great price for purchase
content: along with each piece sold separately.

title: Made to last
identifier: we built our carry kit to be able to handle all of the strain inherent in constant transport and handling. The strength and durability of vegetable tanned leather
content: paired with solid brass hardware and YKK zippers make sure that our products not only look good

A modern update to the classic bi-fold. It discreetly holds a full iPhone 7 charge for an emergency or minimalist travelers. Made from minimally treated
identifier: vegetable-tanned leather from one of America's oldest tanneries. This wallet is designed to beautifully patina with time
is_active: rich leather wallet with a look that is uniquely yours.

title: Using full grain leather means that each of our pieces will be naturally unique. Rather than wearing out
identifier: it will develop a patina over time. Our leather will wear beautifully and only gets better with age.
